structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.catch_line: Director to enforce statutes and regulations.
law.text: The director shall enforce the provisions of KRS 250.371 to 250.451 and make and enforce such regulations as may be necessary to carry into effect the full intent and meaning of KRS 250.371 to 250.451.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 13, effective July 13, 1984.
